dataLabel: get 10 items with a Disease Ontology ID
queryMap:
SPARQL `PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>

SELECT ?item WHERE { ?item wdt:P699 ?doid .} LIMIT 10`@START

dataLabel: get 100 items with a Disease Ontology ID
queryMap:
SPARQL `PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>

SELECT ?item WHERE { ?item wdt:P699 ?doid .} LIMIT 100`@START
